titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exclude from gross income certain amounts received by members of certain firefighting and rescue units.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/27/1987--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income compensation received by a volunteer fire fighter for service as a member of a State or local fire department or rescue unit.
